alert.note: Alert for Franklin; Lincoln; Moore (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 16 at 6:18PM CST by NWS Huntsville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Moore, central Lincoln and western Franklin Counties through 700 PM CST... At 617 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Fayetteville, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Fayetteville, Lynchburg, Huntland, Tims Ford Lake, Lexie Crossroads, Mulberry, Howell, Harmony, Hurdlow and Lois. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 PM CST for Middle Tennessee.
